short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get instant notifications on Youtube videos your friends are watching.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You'll be notified of Youtube videos your friends are watching(in real-time) if they have installed tubePEEK too. tubePEEK will also notify your friends of the Youtube videos you watch.

You can set tubePEEK OFF if you don't want the Youtube videos you watch to be public to your friends.

You can turn OFF sound notifications if you find them annoying.

You can run the extension on Opera browser



▬▬▬▬▬       PLEASE RATE!       ▬▬▬▬▬
